question:
Question: At the initial position, you are asked to navigate to the tree facing the entrance. When you reach your current location, what is your relative position to the destination?  
choose:  
A. I am currently on the upper left side of the tree, close to the road.  
B. I am currently behind and to the right of the tree, at the same height.  
C. I am currently at the top left of the tree, between the building and the tree.  
D. I am currently in front and right of the tree, at a slightly lower altitude.  
E. I am currently directly above the building, far away from the tree.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: B; Reason: The current location, as seen from the top-down view, places the agent behind and to the right of the tree when facing the entrance. The agent is at the same height level as the tree, not above or below it.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 36)]
Option: [B]
Reason: From the top-down view provided in the video, the agent starts at a high altitude and gradually descends. The destination is the tree facing the entrance. At the end of the video, the agent's position is behind and to the right of the tree. The agent is at approximately the same height as the tree. Therefore, option B is the correct answer.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: B; Reason: The current location, as seen from the top-down view, places the agent behind and to the right of the tree when facing the entrance. The agent is at the same height level as the tree, not above or below it.
